origins.title: Key indicators of the UN-Water Global Analysis and Assessment of Sanitation and Drinking-Water (GLAAS). For the specific sources by country, refer to http://www.who.int/water_sanitation_health/monitoring/investments/glaas/en/.
origins.description: The United Nations Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) dataset is the primary collection of data tracking progress towards the SDG indicators, compiled from officially-recognized international sources.
